message.raw: Added DOC_ONLY and PACKAGE_SOURCE_ONLY cmake variables that cause the configuration step to bail out early, before performing checks for system prerequisites (issue #27).  That way CI jobs that build docs or make tarballs don't have to install everything that's needed to actually compile Gazebo.  Actual changes are minor; mostly pulling some stuff up to the front of the configure run.
